message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI

This paper is about language models and their application in text mining and information retrieval. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes a neural model based on recurrent language modeling, which falls under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper deals with author and temporal vector states, which are relevant to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper proposes a method for capturing language diffusion tendencies, which could be relevant to cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
